entry.title: Poems Published Elsewhere
entry.summary:
• "Siste Viator" featured in Susan Dunne's "Syllable: A Monthly Night Of Words And Music At Little River Restoratives" (Hartford Courant, 28 Nov. 2017).
  • Songs "Cellophane" and "Fountain," co-written with Alexander Sheppard, on Pageant Boys' Shadowboxing (The Record Machine, 19 May 2017).
  • 6 poems in Western Beefs of North America, edited …
entry.content:
• "Siste Viator" featured in Susan Dunne's "Syllable: A Monthly Night Of Words And Music At Little River Restoratives" (Hartford Courant, 28 Nov. 2017).
  • Songs "Cellophane" and "Fountain," co-written with Alexander Sheppard, on Pageant Boys' Shadowboxing (The Record Machine, 19 May 2017).
  • 6 poems in Western Beefs of North America, edited by Willis Plummer (Mid 2014).
  • 3 poems in Pop Serial, issue 5, edited by Stephen Tully Dierks (Early 2014).
  • Spoken poem "where my baby at in seattle" in Ho Hum Vol. 1 (Keep This Bag Away From Children, 3 Apr. 2013).
  • "Poem" in Everyday Genius, edited by Stephen Tully Dierks (15 Feb. 2013).
  • Song "Kill Cops, Kill Yourself" in Adam Humphrey's documentary Shitty Youth [at the 6:38 minute mark] (Nov. 2012).
  • 3 poems in Pop Serial, issue 3, edited by Stephen Tully Dierks (Early 2012).
  • "The radiators come on at night and wake me up" in horse ghost, volume one, edited by Matthew Donahoo (Early 2012).
  • 4 poems, co-written with Alexander Sheppard, in elimae, edited by Coop Renner (Feb. 2012).

entry.title: All Along the Livery Line
entry.summary: All Along the Livery Line is a collection of poems published from 2012 to 2014. It is available in PDF here.
entry.content: All Along the Livery Line is a collection of poems published from 2012 to 2014. It is available in PDF here.
